<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4591</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Romans</string>
            <string language="es">Los romanos</string>
            <string language="ga">Na Rómhánaigh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Romans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Romans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Romans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Romans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι Ρωμαίοι</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A worksheet on the Ancient Romans which can be used in comjunction with the BBC Education website.</string>
            <string language="es">Una hoja de trabajo sobre los antiguos romanos que se puede usar junto con la página web educativa de la BBC.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre ar na Rómhánaigh Ársa aar féidir a úsáid i gcomhair le láithreángréasáin Oideacais an BBC.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ICT</string>
            <string language="es">ICT. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">TCF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Bogen auf dem alten Romans, das im comjunction
mit der BBC Ausbildung Web site verwendet werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un tableau sur le Romans antique qui peut être 
utilisé dans le comjunction avec le site Web d'éducation de 
BBC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma folha no Romans antigo que pode ser usado no 
comjunction com o Web site da instrução de BBC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un foglio di lavoro sul Romans antico che può 
essere usato in comjunction con il Web site di formazione di BBC.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα φύλλο εργασίας στους αρχαίους Ρωμαίους που 
μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί στο comjunction με τον ιστοχώρο 
εκπαίδευσης BBC.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ICT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
